## Overview

This section contains research materials specific to the **AI Session Preparation Project**, including:

- Literature reviews focused on tutoring and session preparation
- Design documents and conceptual frameworks
- Data analysis and evaluation results
- Methodological notes and protocols

## Project-Specific Focus

This section focuses specifically on:

- Tutoring preparation practices and challenges
- AI tools designed for educational support contexts
- Evaluation of session preparation interventions
- User studies with tutors and support professionals

For general background on AI in higher education, see the [AI-Ed Research Hub](https://ai-praxis.github.io/ed-ai).

## Using These Materials

These research materials inform the design, implementation, and evaluation of AI-assisted preparation tools developed in this project.

## Contributing

As this project develops, additional research materials will be added here. Project team members can contribute by:

- Adding literature reviews on relevant topics
- Documenting design decisions and rationale
- Sharing evaluation protocols and results
- Recording methodological notes and lessons learned
